name: control-mechanisms
label: Control mechanisms
description: Check control mechanisms for maladjustment interfering with proper operation, also excessive wear of components and contamination by lubricants or other foreign matter.

name: safety-devices
label: Safety devices
description: Check safety devices and operational aid for malfunction.

name: hoses
label: Air and hydraulic lines
description: Check air and hydraulic lines for deterioration or leakage, particularly those which flex during normal operation.

name: hydraulic
label: Hydraulic system
description: Check hydraulic system for proper oil level.

name: hooks
label: Hooks and latches
description: Check hooks and latches for deformation, cracks, excessive wear, or damage such as from chemicals or heat.

name: wire-rope
label: Wire rope
description: Check wire rope reeving for compliance with manufacturer's specifications. OSHA 1926.1413(a)

name: electrical
label: Electrical system
description: Check electrical system for malfunctioning, signs of excessive deterioration, dirt, and moisture accumulation.

name: tires
label: Tires
description: Check tires for proper inflation and wear.

name: ground-conditions
label: Ground conditions
description: Check ground conditions around the equipment for proper support, including ground settling under and around outriggers and supporting foundations, ground water accumulation, or similar conditions.

name: level
label: Level
description: Check the equipment for level position within the tolerances specified by the equipment manufacturer's recommendations, both before each shift and after each move and setup.

name: windows
label: Windows
description: Check operator cab windows for significant cracks, breaks, or other deficiencies that would hamper the operator's view.

name: carrier
label: Carrier parts and equipment
description: Check all the following parts, equipment and accessories are in a safe operating condition and free from apparent damage that could cause failure while in use: all vehicle brakes including: parking, emergency and service brakes; horn; steering mechanism; seat belts; operating controls; safety devices; lights; reflectors; windshield wipers; defrosters; and fire extinguishers. OSHA 1926.601(b)(14)
